languages.text: "Вам не за что просить прощения. Людям свойственно испытывать эмоции — как хорошие, так и плохие. И делиться ими с окружающими".

traits.locale_text: "Вам не за что просить прощения. Людям свойственно испытывать эмоции — как хорошие, так и плохие. И делиться ими с окружающими".

languages.text: "You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."
languages.original_text: "Вам не за что просить прощения. Людям свойственно испытывать эмоции — как хорошие, так и плохие. И делиться ими с окружающими".

traits.locale_text: "You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."
"You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."
"You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."
"You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."
"You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."

languages.text: "Ihr müsst Euch nicht entschuldigen. Menschliche Emotionen sind natürlich, ob es nun gute oder schlechte sind. Und es ist ebenso natürlich, sie mit anderen zu teilen."
languages.original_text: "You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst Euch nicht entschuldigen. Menschliche Emotionen sind natürlich, ob es nun gute oder schlechte sind. Und es ist ebenso natürlich, sie mit anderen zu teilen."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez aucune raison de vous excuser. Les émotions humaines sont naturelles, qu'elles soient bonnes ou mauvaises. Et il est tout aussi naturel de les partager avec les autres. »
languages.original_text: "You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez aucune raison de vous excuser. Les émotions humaines sont naturelles, qu'elles soient bonnes ou mauvaises. Et il est tout aussi naturel de les partager avec les autres. »

languages.text: “没什么好道歉的。人类的情感纯属自然流露，有好也有坏。想要与人分享心情也是很自然的行为。”
languages.original_text: "You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."

traits.locale_text: “没什么好道歉的。人类的情感纯属自然流露，有好也有坏。想要与人分享心情也是很自然的行为。”

languages.text: 「謝る必要は何もない。人間の感情は、良いものであれ悪いものであれ、自然なものだからな。そして、それを他者と共有するのも、また自然なものである」
languages.original_text: "You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."

traits.locale_text: 「謝る必要は何もない。人間の感情は、良いものであれ悪いものであれ、自然なものだからな。そして、それを他者と共有するのも、また自然なものである」

languages.text: «No tiene nada por lo que disculparse. Las emociones humanas son naturales, sean buenas o malas. Y es igual de natural compartirlas con los demás».
languages.original_text: "You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."

traits.locale_text: «No tiene nada por lo que disculparse. Las emociones humanas son naturales, sean buenas o malas. Y es igual de natural compartirlas con los demás».

languages.text: "Özür dileyecek bir şey yok. İnsani duygular bunlar. İyisiyle kötüsüyle... Tamamen doğal. Bunları paylaşmak istemen kadar doğal."
languages.original_text: "You have nothing to apologise for. Human emotions are natural, be they good or bad. And it is just as natural to share them with others."
